alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 08 at 3:15AM AKST until November 10 at 7:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast, Northern Arctic Coast, Central Beaufort Sea Coast and Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. Rapid reductions in visibility from blowing snow are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Numerous snow showers are also expected in this time period and would create even further reductions in visibility within any snow shower.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast
